scan_metadata.description: elb - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check connection draining
check_functions.description: Checks if connection draining is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check cross-zone load balancing
check_functions.description: Checks if cross-zone load balancing is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check desync mitigation mode
Code Executable - API call to check SSL ciphers
Code Executable - API call to check internet-facing status
Code Executable - API call to check multi-AZ deployment
check_functions.description: Checks if ELB is deployed in multiple AZs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check logging enabled
check_functions.description: Checks if logging is enabled for ELB

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check SSL listeners
check_functions.description: Checks if SSL listeners are configured

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check ACM certificate usage
check_functions.description: Checks if SSL listeners use ACM certificates

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check TLS certificate
check_functions.description: Checks TLS certificate configuration for ELB

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - API call to check secure protocols
check_functions.description: Checks if secure protocols are enabled for listeners
